docs.title: unsigned char ch376_check_exist(void);
docs.text:
Description

If ch376 is present, it will return 0XAA

Returns

  • 0XAA if it's OK

docs.title: void ch376_wr_usb_data(char *data);
docs.text:
Description

Send data to usb device. First byte must be the the length to send

docs.title: ch376_check_exist
docs.text:
Description

If ch376 is present, it will return $AA

Modify

  • Accumulator Returns

  • Accumulator : $AA if it's OK

jsr ch376_check_exist cmp #$AA beq @exists rts ; Does not exist @exists: ... ```

docs.title: ch376_delay_100us
docs.text:
Description

Wait 100 us

Modify

  • Accumulator jsr ch376_delay_100us ; exit when 100us is finished ```

docs.title: ch376_dir_create
docs.text:
Description

create a folder

Modify

  • Accumulator * X Register From ch376_wait_response_call Y Register From ch376_wait_response_call Returns*

  • Accumulator : ch376 status values

jsr ch376_dir_create ; check accumulator here ch376_wait_response had been launched by ch376_dir_create ```

Get ch376 firmware version

docs.title: ch376_issue_token_x
docs.text:
Description

Send Token for control transfert

Input

  • Accumulator : ch376 Token

Modify

  • Accumulator * X Register * Y Register From ch376_wait_response Returns

  • Accumulator : ch376 status

lda #$80 jsr ch376_issue_token_x ; check accumulator for ch376 status ```

docs.title: ch376_lib_version
docs.text:
Description

Get lib version

Modify

  • Accumulator Returns

  • Accumulator : ch376 lib version

jsr ch376_lib_version cmp #CH376_LIB_VERSION_2024_2 beq @right_version ; Wrong version ... rts @right_version: ... rts ```

docs.title: ch376_reset_all
docs.text:
Description

reset CH376

Modify

  • Accumulator * X Register * Y Register jsr ch376_reset_all rts ```

docs.title: ch376_seek_file
docs.text:
Description

Seek file. Performs a wait_response

Input

  • Accumulator : First byte
  • Y Register : second byte
  • X Register : third byte byte
  • RES : Fourth byte

Modify

  • Accumulator * X Register from ch376_wait_response call Y Register from ch376_wait_response call Returns*

  • Accumulator : ch376 status values

lda #$04 sta RES lda #$01 ldy #$02 ldx #$03 jsr ch376_seek_file ; check accumulator here ch376_wait_response had been launched by ch376_seek_file ```

Not tested

docs.title: ch376_set_address
docs.text:
Description

set usb address

Modify

  • X Register lda #$02 jsr ch376_set_address ; Check A with ch376 status ```

docs.title: ch376_set_bytes_read
docs.text:
Description

Set bytes to read. Manage only 16 bits. Others bytes are set to 0 to provide 32 bits integer to ch376 chip

Input

  • Accumulator : Low value
  • Y Register : High value

Modify

  • X Register * Accumulator lda #$02 ldy #$10 jsr ch376_set_bytes_read

---

## ch376_write_entry_point

---

## ch376_set_bytes_write

***Description***

Set bytes to write. Manage only 16 bits. Others bytes are set to 0 to provide 32 bits integer to ch376 chip

***Input***

* Accumulator : Low value
* Y Register : High value


***Modify***

* X Register * Accumulator 
 lda #$02
 ldy #$10
 jsr ch376_set_bytes_write

docs.title: ch376_set_config
docs.text:
Description

set config for usb device

Input

  • Accumulator : config value

Modify

  • X Register lda #$02 jsr ch376_set_config ```

docs.title: ch376_set_usb_addr
docs.text:
Description

set usb_address

Input

  • Accumulator : The address to set

Modify

  • X Register ; Set usb addr lda #$02 jsr ch376_set_usb_addr rts ```

docs.title: ch376_set_usb_mode
docs.text:
Description

Set usb mode

Input

  • Accumulator : The usb mode to set

Modify

  • X Register lda #CH376_USB_MODE_HOST_RESET jsr ch376_set_usb_mode rts ```

docs.title: ch376_set_usb_speed
docs.text:
Description

Set usb mode

Input

  • Accumulator : The speed for usb

Modify

  • X Register lda #$02 jsr ch376_set_usb_speed rts ```

docs.title: ch376_wait_response
docs.text:
Description

Perform wait_response. It's not needed to call because some commands already perform ch376_wait_response

Modify

  • Accumulator * X Register * Y Register Returns

  • Accumulator : "ch376 status" value (or return 1 if usb controller does not respond)

jsr ch376_wait_response rts ```

docs.title: ch376_wr_usb_data
docs.text:
Description

Send data to usb device. First byte must be the the length to send

Input

  • Accumulator : Low byte of ptr data
  • X Register : High byte of ptr data

Modify

  • Accumulator * Y Register * X Register * RESUsed

lda #data jsr ch376_wr_usb_data rts data: ; length, set port feature, set feature, port_power,0, Id port, 0, 0, 0 .byte 8,$23,3,8,0,1,0,0 ```
